channel.title: Big problem with 508 sever - making ppl and me a admin - plx help
channel.description:
hello everyone im new at coding 508
i dont know how to do aah a little i think just client.java but
ive downloaded a source and tried to get on.. it works etc nice server.. but when i try to make myself admin first i need to log out then right from 0 to 2 and the`n i need to log in. but if i do that then i am on the place of starting again - like i never played the server and logged in. and then i did check it im not admin so i did go to the characters file and then... lmao when i did open it lawl i saw the whole text in chinese words blabla. can anyone help me how it will work? i wanna make my admin etc. please help.
ILL BE VERY PLEASED OMFG.
ty ;)

no man pff and now?

item.title: Big problem with 508 sever - making ppl and me a admin - plx help
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

Its in login.java and it should look like

if (p.username.equals("there wil be a name here")) { p.rights = 2; }
Change to your name[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 11:19:30 am[/size][hr]and to make someone else admin/mod copy that and then put it under the other one and change the user name and p.rights to 1 for mod or leave it at 2 for admin

Read full topic
